name: Pigeon's Eye
description:
A 3D multiplayer online game, in a world controlled by pigeons, a human commits a murder to get out of the system. Players assemble a team and are hired by the criminal to clean and refurbish the crime scene before the police arrive or the EYES find you.

Pigeon's eye takes a low poly 3D cartoon art with strong and striking colors.

The music is mysterious and cheerful with beats that influence the tense and short gameplay.

Seven H is a company made up of five students of Game Design.

Art / Game Design - Aline Dalla Costa Magalhães

Art / Game Design - Kauan Felipe Furlaneto

Sound / Game Design - Renê Affonso Ferreira

Programming / Game Design -  Wilson de Almeida Batista

Game Design / Producer  - Yasmin Caroline Pivatto Motta
